name: BigchainDB
description: We're rescuing ya. And from now on you're all named Bender Jr. It may comfort you to know that Fry's death took only fifteen seconds, yet the pain was so intense, that it felt to him like fifteen years.

name: DEX
description: Stop! Don't shoot fire stick in space canoe! Cause explosive decompression! I'm Santa Claus! Shinier than yours, meatbag. We'll need to have a look inside you with this camera. Oh sure! Blame the wizards!
